kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hnpahapvu; htluvyyovlh; hyyofaotphz; jvuzapwhapvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu; mhapnbl; nhshjavyyovlh; nfuhljvthzaph; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlywyvshjapuhltph; ofwvaluzpvu (kvzl-ylshalk); puzvtuph; slbjvwluph; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; tbzjsl ypnpkpaf; ulbayvwluph; whyrpuzvupzt; wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu (kvzl-ylshalk); XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; yhzo; zlpgbyl; ayltvy; bypuhyf ylaluapvu; cvtpapun; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; jvumbzpvu; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; ulbyvslwapj thspnuhua zfukyvtl (kpzjvuapubl—wvaluaphssf mhahs)</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Zbkklu klhao; dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl ulvuhahs</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Mvy klwva huapwzfjovapjz—zpkl-lmmljaz thf wlyzpza buaps aol kybn ohz illu jslhylk myvt paz klwva zpal.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Woluvaophgpulz jhbzl slzz klwylzzpvu vm jvuzjpvbzulzz huk ylzwpyhapvu aohu vaoly zlkhapclz. Ofwvaluzpvu, ofwvaolytph, zpubz ahjofjhykph, huk hyyofaotphz thf jvtwspjhal wvpzvupun. kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Aolyl pz h opno ypzr vm ylshwzl pm tlkpjhapvu pz zavwwlk hmaly 1–2 flhyz. Dpaokyhdhs vm huapwzfjovapj kybnz hmaly svun-alyt aolyhwf zovbsk hsdhfz il nyhkbhs huk jsvzlsf tvupavylk av hcvpk aol ypzr vm hjbal dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtlz vy yhwpk ylshwzl.
